title: fugue
description: FMRIB's Utility for Geometric Unwarping of EPIs

asym_se_time.title: Asym se time
asym_se_time.description: Set the fieldmap asymmetric spin echo time (sec).

dwell_time.title: Dwell time
dwell_time.description: Set the epi dwell time per phase-encode line - same as echo spacing - (sec).

dwell_to_asym_ratio.title: Dwell to asym ratio
dwell_to_asym_ratio.description: Set the dwell to asym time ratio.

forward_warping.title: Forward warping
forward_warping.description: Apply forward warping instead of unwarping.

fourier_order.title: Fourier order
fourier_order.description: Apply fourier (sinusoidal) fitting of order n.

icorr.title: Icorr
icorr.description: Apply intensity correction to unwarping (pixel shift method only).

no_extend.title: No extend
no_extend.description: Do not apply rigid-body extrapolation to the fieldmap.

no_gap_fill.title: No gap fill
no_gap_fill.description: Do not apply gap-filling measure to the fieldmap.

nokspace.title: Nokspace
nokspace.description: Do not use k-space forward warping.

output_type.title: Output type
output_type.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

phase_conjugate.title: Phase conjugate
phase_conjugate.description: Apply phase conjugate method of unwarping.

poly_order.title: Poly order
poly_order.description: Apply polynomial fitting of order n.

save_unmasked_fmap.title: Save unmasked fmap
save_unmasked_fmap.description: Saves the unmasked fieldmap when using --savefmap.

save_unmasked_shift.title: Save unmasked shift
save_unmasked_shift.description: Saves the unmasked shiftmap when using --saveshift.

shift_in_file.title: Shift in file
shift_in_file.description: Filename for reading pixel shift volume.

shift_out_file.title: Shift out file
shift_out_file.description: Filename for saving pixel shift volume.

smooth2d.title: Smooth2d
smooth2d.description: Apply 2d gaussian smoothing of sigma n (in mm).

smooth3d.title: Smooth3d
smooth3d.description: Apply 3d gaussian smoothing of sigma n (in mm).

unwarp_direction.title: Unwarp direction
unwarp_direction.description: 'x' or 'y' or 'z' or 'x-' or 'y-' or 'z-'. Specifies direction of warping (default y).

unwarped_file.title: Unwarped file
unwarped_file.description: Apply unwarping and save as filename.

warped_file.title: Warped file
warped_file.description: Apply forward warping and save as filename.
